files.description: Core physics calculations for the freefall simulation
Apple model representing the falling object
Main entry point for the simulation
files.content:
from src.core.PhysicsEngine import PhysicsEngine
from src.models.Apple import Apple
from src.models.Environment import Environment

def main():
    apple = Apple()
    environment = Environment()
    engine = PhysicsEngine(apple, environment)
    
    # Simulation loop would go here
    
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
